summary: A family in the city of Tokyo running a liquor store overcome their impotence and dysfunction as they induce an understanding through each other of how to deal with their individual problems.
cast: Keiji Sada|Yoshiko Kuga|Hideko Takamine|Akira Ishihama|Minoru Ôki|Toshiko Kobayashi|Masami Taura|Kumeko Urabe|Chieko Nakakita|Shin'ichi Himori|Ryôhei Uchida|Masaki Hayashi|Masahiko Inoue|Jô Mitsumura|Eiko Miyoshi|Kayoko Muramatsu|Sayoko Natsume|Teruko Ninomiya|Yôichi Ohsugi|Kazuko Okada|Tsuneko Sasaki|Toshio Shimamura|Hisashi Taki|Mari Tanahashi|Yoshino Tani|Jun Tanizaki|Kayoko Terada|Fumio Tooyama|Keiji Tsuchida|Tami Yamaki
title: Kono hiroi sora no dokoka ni
